sentences.sentence: Observation on ambulatory EEGs in patients with subarachnoid hemorrhage.
sentences.translation: 蛛网膜下腔出血患者的动态脑电图观察。

sentences.sentence: Your patient has suffered a type of stroke called subarachnoid hemorrhage (SAH).
sentences.translation: 您的病人患上了一种名为蛛网膜下出血(SAH)的中风病症。

sentences.sentence: This study found that the size of the subarachnoid space did not differ significantly between the 3 positions.
sentences.translation: 这项研究发现，蛛网膜下腔的大小在3个位置之间没有显着不同。
